list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: throw (something) somewhere lightly, easily, or casually.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Suzy tossed her bag onto the sofa
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Suzy ném túi lên ghế sofa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move or cause to move from side to side or back and forth.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the trees tossed in the wind
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những cái cây quăng trong gió

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an action or instance of tossing something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a defiant toss of her head
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một sự thách thức ném đầu của cô ấy
